item.title: 中国卡车公司的传奇故事暴露美国国家安全漏洞
item.description:
美国官员认为他们已经与TuSimple达成了一项协议，以保护自动驾驶技术。【原文：

American officials thought they’d secured a deal with TuSimple to protect autonomous-driving technology. It didn’t work.

item.title: 华尔街上涨后，亚洲股市也将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市跟随华尔街的步伐准备反弹，华尔街在科技股短暂回落后买盘介入，美国劳动力市场复苏的迹象提振了投资者情绪。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to rebound Thursday, following Wall Street’s lead, where buyers stepped in after a brief retreat in technology shares and signs of a resilient US labor market boosted investor sentiment.】

item.title: 大都会人寿盈利超预期，私募股权投资获得收益
item.description: 大都会人寿保险公司（MetLife Inc.【原文：MetLife Inc. reported third-quarter earnings that edged out Wall Street expectations as returns on private equity investments rose.】

item.title: Fortinet 因最大收入部门未达预期而下跌
item.description: 网络安全公司 Fortinet Inc. 的服务部门收入不及预期，导致其业绩下滑。【原文：The cybersecurity company Fortinet Inc. sank as revenue in its service segment missed expectations.】

item.title: 在连续几周需求低迷之后，Energos 公司达成了 15 亿美元的垃圾邮件协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由于液化天然气运输船运营商难以吸引投资者的需求，Energos Infrastructure 已搁置了 15 亿美元的垃圾债券销售计划。【原文：Energos Infrastructure has shelved a $1.5 billion junk-bond sale as the liquefied natural gas carrier operator struggled to attract investor demand, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 最高法院关税减免引发梅西百货和美泰股价大涨
item.description: 美国一些顶级零售品牌，从百货公司到玩具制造商和服装公司，其股票周三均出现反弹，原因是美国最高法院持怀疑态度，这增加了今年对该行业造成压力的全面关税可能被取消的希望。【原文：Stocks in some of America’s top retail brands, from department stores to toymakers and apparel companies, rallied Wednesday as a skeptical US Supreme Court raised hopes the sweeping tariffs that have weighed on the sector this year could be lifted.】

item.title: 瑞波总裁朗称 "无计划、无时间表 "上市
item.description: 瑞波公司（Ripple）是一家专注于加密货币的金融技术公司，目前没有任何计划加入最近上市或表示希望在不久的将来上市的数十家数字资产公司的行列。【原文：Ripple, the crypto-focused financial technology firm, doesn’t have any immediate plans to join the scores of digital asset companies that have recently gone public or expressed aspirations to do so in the near future.】

item.title: 美联储让银行更容易获得 "管理良好 "评级
item.description: 美联储周三表示，已最终确定对大型银行监管评级框架的修改，放宽了对某些贷款机构的要求。【原文：The Federal Reserve said Wednesday it had finalized changes to its supervisory rating framework for large banks, easing the requirements for certain lenders.】

item.title: 巴西将利率维持在近二十年高位以抗击通胀
item.description: 周三，巴西将其关键利率维持在近二十年来的高位不变，凸显了央行继续严厉打击顽固通胀的决心。【原文：Brazil held its key interest rate unchanged at a near two-decade high on Wednesday, underscoring the central bank’s resolve to stay tough on stubborn inflation.】

item.title: 拉姆-伊曼纽尔为美国开出的药方是 "返璞归真
item.description:
这位前芝加哥市长表示，将资金投入研究和教育是实现 "美国梦 "的可行之道。他也不排除竞选总统的可能性。【原文：

The former Chicago mayor says pouring money into research and education is the way to make the “American Dream” viable. He also won’t rule out a run for president.

】

item.title: Robinhood 加密货币收入不及预期，首席财务官第一季度离职
item.description: 面向散户投资者的在线经纪公司 Robinhood Markets Inc. 公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，但加密货币收入不足。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc., the online brokerage that caters to retail investors, reported a third-quarter profit that beat Wall Street expectations but fell short on cryptocurrency revenue.】

item.title: Figma 对扩大产品套件的影响作出有力展望
item.description: 今年早些时候上市的设计软件公司 Figma Inc. 展望本季度收入和利润将好于预期，并吹捧新产品的采用。【原文：Figma Inc., a design software company that went public earlier this year, gave an outlook for better-than-expected quarterly revenue and profit, touting the adoption of new products.】

item.title: 尽管商业银行业务有所增长，但澳大利亚国民银行利润下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank Ltd.）的利润略低于预期，尽管其主要业务和私人银行部门实现了增长。【原文：National Australia Bank Ltd.’s profit came in just shy of expectations even as it saw growth in its key business and private banking division.】

item.title: Lyft 公布强劲预订量前景，缓解扩张担忧
item.description: Lyft Inc. 预计本季度预订量将加速增长，这缓解了人们对该打车公司在全球扩张和保持客户忠诚度方面所做努力的担忧。【原文：Lyft Inc. projected an acceleration in bookings this quarter, easing concerns about the ridehailing company’s efforts to expand globally and maintain customer loyalty.】

item.title: Snap 与 Perplexity 达成 4 亿美元交易，为聊天添加人工智能搜索功能
item.description: Snap公司周三发表声明，宣布与Perplexity AI公司合作，向全球Snapchat用户分发该公司的人工智能搜索引擎。消息传出后，Snapchat股价在盘后交易中大涨16%。【原文：Snap Inc. announced a $400 million partnership with Perplexity AI Inc. to distribute the firm’s AI search engine to Snapchat users globally, according to a statement Wednesday. The shares surged 16% in extended trading after the news.】

item.title: 电动汽车生产陷入困境，Lucid 出现超预期亏损
item.description: Lucid Group Inc. 公布的第三季度亏损低于预期，该公司正努力应对其 Gravity SUV 生产低迷和充满挑战的贸易环境。【原文：Lucid Group Inc. posted a worse-than-expected third-quarter loss as it grapples with sluggish production of its Gravity SUV and a challenging trade environment.】

item.title: DoorDash 订单超预期，预示 2026 年将有更多支出
item.description: 美国最大的食品配送服务公司 DoorDash 公司在公布第三季度订单好于预期后表示，明年将再投资 "数亿美元 "用于新举措和加强内部工具。【原文：DoorDash Inc., the largest food delivery service in the US, said it will invest “several hundred million” more next year toward new initiatives and beefing up internal tools after posting better-than-expected orders for the third quarter.】

item.title: Arm 发布看涨预测，指向人工智能需求激增
item.description: 提供最广泛应用的计算处理器技术的 Arm Holdings Plc 公司，在设计用于运行人工智能数据中心的芯片的兴趣日益高涨的推动下，给出了乐观的收入预测。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc, which provides the most widely used technology in computing processors, gave a bullish revenue forecast, helped by increasing interest in designing chips to run AI data centers.】

item.title: Duolingo上调业绩展望，其最高级别产品获得青睐
item.description: Duolingo Inc.上调了今年的营收预期，原因是用户需要支付更多费用才能与人工智能机器人聊天，学习一门新语言。【原文：Duolingo Inc. raised its revenue guidance for the year as users pay more to chat with AI bots to learn a new language.】

item.title: 高通公司发布乐观预测；税制变化带来巨额支出
item.description: 最大的智能手机处理器制造商高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Qualcomm Inc., the largest maker of smartphone processors, gave a bullish revenue forecast for the current period, though a US tax change took a toll on profit last quarter.】

item.title: 马来西亚经济保持稳定，不惧区域宽松政策
item.description: 马来西亚准备在周四维持基准利率不变，稳定的经济增长、温和的通货膨胀和坚挺的林吉特使央行得以保留政策弹药。【原文：Malaysia is poised to keep its benchmark interest rate unchanged on Thursday, with stable growth, benign inflation and a strengthening ringgit allowing the central bank to preserve policy ammunition.】

item.title: 关税忧虑消退，索尼股价再创新高
item.description: 沃尔夫研究公司（Wolfe Research）的彼得-苏比诺（Peter Supino）是索尼集团公司（Sony Group Corp.）的最大看涨者，七个月前，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统推出的全面关税政策导致这位分析师下调了这家日本娱乐和电子公司的评级。【原文：Wolfe Research’s Peter Supino has emerged as the biggest bull on Sony Group Corp., seven months after President Donald Trump’s rollout of sweeping tariffs caused the analyst to downgrade the Japanese entertainment and electronics company.】

item.title: 众议院重要共和党人就外国规则向 OpenAI 的 Altman 施压
item.description: 众议院司法委员会主席吉姆-乔丹（Jim Jordan）向 OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）发出传票，要求提供有关这家人工智能初创公司与外国政府就遵守规则问题进行接触的信息，乔丹称这些规则可能会影响美国人的言论自由权。【原文：House Judiciary Committee Chair Jim Jordan sent a subpoena to OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman demanding information on the artificial intelligence startup’s engagement with foreign governments about complying with rules that Jordan said could impact Americans’ free speech rights.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会考虑拜登时代要求加强网络安全的裁决
item.description: 美国曾寻求有关疑似中国黑客攻击的信息。【原文：US had sought information on suspected Chinese hack.】

item.title: 加密货币申请信托牌照引发银行业警觉
item.description: 美国银行和加密货币公司正在升级一场酝酿已久的关于数字资产监管未来的冲突—而这场战斗正越来越多地集中在一个狭窄但强大的通道上：国家信托银行章程。【原文：US banks and crypto firms are escalating a long-simmering clash over the future of digital-asset regulation — and the battle is increasingly centered on a narrow but powerful gateway: national trust-bank charters.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席财务官表示，对泡沫保持警惕的市场需要更多的人工智能 "繁荣"。
item.description: OpenAI 首席财务官莎拉-弗里尔（Sarah Friar）认为，市场过于关注对人工智能领域可能出现泡沫的担忧，而应该对该技术的潜力表现出更多的 "热情"。【原文：OpenAI Chief Financial Officer Sarah Friar suggested the market is overly focused on anxiety about a possible bubble in the artificial intelligence sector and should muster more “exuberance” about the technology’s potential.】

item.title: 我们对贬值交易有何感想？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 苹果公司即将与谷歌达成协议，每年为 Siri 人工智能模型支付约 10 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，苹果公司正计划使用Alphabet公司旗下谷歌公司开发的1.2万亿参数的人工智能模型，为其承诺已久的对Siri语音助手的全面改进提供动力。【原文：Apple Inc. is planning to use a 1.2 trillion parameter artificial intelligence model developed by Alphabet Inc.’s Google to help power its long-promised overhaul of the Siri voice assistant, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行警告：美元面临 2000 年代繁荣与萧条并存的 40% 下跌风险
item.description: 据加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）称，一旦支撑美元的驱动因素转为阻力，美元可能会出现类似互联网泡沫的繁荣与萧条的循环，交易者应防范美元的长期抛售。【原文：Traders should take cover from a protracted selloff in the dollar that could mirror the boom-and-bust cycle of the Internet bubble once the drivers that are supporting the currency turn into headwinds, according to RBC Capital Markets.】

item.title: 法拉奇的改革计划：重整城市，促进英国经济增长
item.description: 奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）领导的 "改革英国"（Reform UK）正在制定计划，对金融监管、税收和养老金进行广泛改革，以期在该党于 2029 年举行的下届大选后上台执政时重振英国经济。【原文：Nigel Farage’s Reform UK is drawing up plans for a broad shake-up of financial regulation, taxation and pensions in a bid to revive Britain’s economy if the party comes to power after the next election due by 2029.】
